Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.scenes

Class ProductionScene

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.TextScene
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.scenes.ProductionScene
public class ProductionScene
extends TextScene
CLI scene to let the player do a Production move
